list_definition.definition: stress put on certain words in speaking etc; greater force of voice used in words or parts of words to make them more noticeable

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: In writing we sometimes underline words to show emphasis.
‘I do not intend to go,’ he said with emphasis.
He placed great emphasis on this point.
